Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant with clear signs of health when it gets water and light.
The student can draw the difference in appearance of a plant that doesn't get enough water compared to one that does.
The student can draw the difference in appearance of a plant that doesn't get enough light compared to one that does.
The student can include details that show how plants can't grow or live without water.
The student can include details that show how plants can't grow or live without light.
